gen:link.msg:message: e7496_e: ldr_v0085: In T 07.00, no empty value in the cell (c0030, c0040, c0061, c0071, c0080 c0090, c0100, c0110) --> [T 07.00 (All rows)] if ({{c0010}} != empty and {{c0020}} != empty) then ({{c0030}} != empty and {{c0040}} != empty and {{c0061}} != empty and {{c0071}} != empty and {{c0080}} != empty and {{c0090}} != empty and {{c0100}} != empty and {{c0110}} != empty) FAILS because if ((not(empty(xfi:fact-typed-dimension-value($a, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim', 'IDR'))/*[1]) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'a'))) and not(empty($b) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'b'))))) then ((not(empty($c) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'c'))) and not(empty($d) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'd'))) and not(empty($e) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'e'))) and not(empty($f) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'f'))) and not(empty($g) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'g'))) and not(empty($h) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'h'))) and not(empty($i) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'i'))) and not(empty($j) or xff:has-fallback-value(QName('', 'j'))))) else (true()) is not true
